original_text:
Monopoly Megaways
Chi non ha mai giocato al divertente gioco in scatola Monopoly? Per i più nostalgici oggi è possibile rivivere l’emozionante percorso a caselle con la slot online senza registrazione Monopoly MegaWays realizzata da Big Time Gaming. Scopri subito cosa nasconde la colorata scacchiera…
Come si gioca?
Monopoly MegaWays è una slot senza scaricare a 6 rulli con ben 117.649 modi per vincere.  Giocabile da 00,10€ fino a 20,00€ a giro su tutti i dispositivi, questa divertente slot online utilizza il motore Reel Adventure e il MegaWays. Si tratta di una slot altamente volatile: puoi vincere fino a 3.500 volte la tua puntata su ogni giro del gioco base, con pagamenti che possono raggiungere 14.700 volte la tua puntata su ogni giro gratuito! Inotre, con la funzione Reazioni per vittorie continue, Mr Monopoly si muove per il tabellone per offrirti funzioni extra come il numero massimo di giri MegaWays, aumentando il moltiplicatore nella funzione Giri gratuiti.
Simboli più caratteristici
I simboli includono A, K, Q, J, 10 e 9 reali. Se hai mente il gioco in modalità cartacea riconoscerai immediatamente le icone dorate del cane, della macchina da corsa, del cappello a cilindro e della nave corazzata. Anche il simbolo “M” (che rappresenta il Monopoly) è tutto in oro e tempestato di gioielli. Esso rappresenta il Jolly e sostituisce tutti i simboli normali.
Nota bene! Grazie alla modalità MegaWays prima, avrai molti più modi per vincere: ogni rullo infatti, può avere da 2 a 7 simboli. Più simboli per bobina, più modi per vincere. Se hai 7 simboli su ciascuno dei 6 rulli, giocherai con 117.649 MegaWays.
Le Funzionalità delle Reazioni e di Reel Adventure

La funzione a Reazioni – Quando ottieni una combinazione vincente, i simboli interessati scompaiono per essere sostituiti da quelli nuovi. Questo ti permette di vincere in modo continuativo ad ogni giro. Le vincite si formano ottenendo i simboli corrispondenti a partire dalla bobina 1.
La Meccanica Reel Adventure non è nuova nelle slot online di Big Time Gaming, infatti è disponibile anche nel gioco Holy Diver. In base a dove atterri potrai ricevere proprietà, giri gratis, moltiplicatori e vantaggi esclusivi, tutti visionabili dalla Tabella Premi del gioco.

Funzione giri gratuti
Monopoly MegaWays è dotato di una funzione Free Spins, che si attiva quando raggiungi una quinta casa ad una proprietà o se ci atterri sopra per caso. Partendo da 8 giri gratis iniziali, dopo la quinta casa e per ogni stazione ferroviaria di proprietà riceverai 1 giro gratuito aggiuntivo. Ogni volta che attivi i giri gratuiti in più la prima volta, otterrai altri 3 giri gratuiti. Non perdere di vista Mr Monopoly e suoi spostamenti veloci sulla scacchiera: alcuni spazi sul tabellone nascondono fantastici bonus!
Da gioco in scatola a slot online
Monopoly MegaWays è una slot gratis basata sulla funzione Free Spins, che ti permetterà  di sfruttare giri gratuiti illimitati e un moltiplicatore di vincita infinito. La chiave per vincere? Utilizzare entrambe le innovative meccaniche di gioco MegaWays e Reel Adventure e per i più esperti provare a giocare anche con soldi veri per ricevere bonus senza deposito o con deposito imperdibili.

raw_translation.response:
Monopoly Megaways

Who hasn't played the fun board game Monopoly? For the most nostalgic, today it's possible to relive the exciting course with the Monopoly Megaways slot game created by Big Time Gaming. Discover what the colorful board hides...

How to play?

Monopoly Megaways is a 6-reel slot game with 117,649 ways to win. Playable from €0.10 up to €20 per spin on all devices, this fun online slot uses the Reel Adventure engine and the MegaWays. It's a highly volatile slot game: you can win up to 3,500 times your bet on each base game spin, with payouts that can reach up to 14,700 times your bet on each free spin! In addition, with the Reactions feature for continuous wins, Mr. Monopoly moves around the board to offer you extra features such as the maximum number of MegaWays spins, increasing the multiplier in the Free Spins feature.

Most distinctive symbols

The symbols include real A, K, Q, J, 10 and 9. If you remember the paper version of the game, you will immediately recognize the golden icons of the dog, the race car, the top hat, and the battleship. Even the "M" symbol (representing Monopoly) is all in gold and studded with jewels. It represents the Wild and replaces all normal symbols.

Note! Thanks to the MegaWays mode, you will have many more ways to win: each reel can have from 2 to 7 symbols. The more symbols per reel, the more ways to win. If you have 7 symbols on each of the 6 reels, you will play with 117,649 MegaWays.

Reaction Functionality and Reel Adventure

The Reaction feature - when you get a winning combination, the symbols involved disappear to be replaced by new ones. This allows you to win continuously with each spin. Wins are formed by getting matching symbols starting from reel 1.

The Reel Adventure Mechanic is not new in Big Time Gaming online slots, it is also available in the game Holy Diver. Depending on where you land, you can receive properties, free spins, multipliers, and exclusive benefits, all visible from the game's Prize Table.

Free Spins Feature

Monopoly Megaways has a Free Spins feature that is activated when you reach a fifth house on a property or if you land on it by chance. Starting with 8 initial free spins, after the fifth house and for each railway property, you will receive an additional free spin. Every time you activate more free spins for the first time, you will get another 3 free spins. Keep an eye on Mr. Monopoly and his quick movements on the board: some spaces on the board hide fantastic bonuses!

From board game to online slot

Monopoly Megaways is a free slot game based on the Free Spins feature, which will allow you to take advantage of unlimited free spins and an infinite win multiplier. The key to winning? Use both innovative MegaWays and Reel Adventure gameplay mechanics and for the most experienced players, try playing with real money to receive irresistible no deposit or deposit bonuses.

Review: Monopoly Megaways

Who hasn't played the fun board game Monopoly before? For those who are feeling nostalgic, you can now relive the exciting journey through squares with the online slot game Monopoly Megaways created by Big Time Gaming. Discover what the colorful checkerboard holds...

How to play?

Monopoly Megaways is a 6-reel slot game with 117,649 ways to win. Playable from €0.10 up to €20.00 per spin on all devices, this fun online slot uses the Reel Adventure engine and MegaWays. It is a highly volatile slot game: you can win up to 3,500 times your bet on each base game spin, with payments that can reach 14,700 times your bet on each free spin! In addition, with the Reactions function for continued wins, Mr. Monopoly moves around the board to offer you extra features such as the maximum number of MegaWays spins, increasing the multiplier in the Free Spins feature.

Most characteristic symbols

The symbols include A, K, Q, J, 10 and 9 royals. If you are familiar with the paper-based game, you will immediately recognize the golden icons of the dog, the race car, the top hat, and the battleship. Even the symbol "M" (representing Monopoly) is all gold and studded with jewels. It represents the Wild and replaces all normal symbols.

Note! Thanks to the MegaWays feature, you will have many more ways to win: each reel can have 2 to 7 symbols. More symbols per reel, more ways to win. If you have 7 symbols on each of the 6 reels, you will be playing with 117,649 MegaWays.

Reactions and Reel Adventure Features

The Reactions feature - When you get a winning combination, the symbols involved disappear to be replaced by new ones. This allows you to win continuously on each spin. Wins are formed by getting matching symbols starting from reel 1.

The Reel Adventure Mechanic is not new in Big Time Gaming's online slots, in fact, it is also available in the game Holy Diver. Depending on where you land, you can receive properties, free spins, multipliers, and exclusive advantages, all of which can be seen from the game's Reward Table.

Free Spins Feature

Monopoly Megaways comes with a Free Spins feature, which activates when you reach a fifth house on a property or if you happen to land on it by chance. Starting with 8 initial free spins, after the fifth house and for each owned railway station, you will receive an additional free spin. Every time you activate the extra free spins for the first time, you will get another 3 free spins. Keep an eye on Mr. Monopoly and his fast movements on the board: some spaces on the board hide fantastic bonuses!

From board game to online slot

Monopoly Megaways is a free slot game based on the Free Spins feature, which will allow you to take advantage of unlimited free spins and an infinite win multiplier. The key to winning? Use both of the innovative MegaWays and Reel Adventure gameplay mechanics and for the more experienced try playing with real money to receive unbeatable no deposit or deposit bonuses.
